features.name: Authentication
features.description: User login/logout with email/password, password recovery, magic links. Role-based access control with super admin hardcoded emails. AuthContext handles authentication state across the app.

features.name: Dashboard
features.description: Main dashboard with metrics overview including orders, inventory levels, and financial summaries. Shows real-time business insights.

features.name: Inventory Management
features.description: Complete CRUD for inventory items, stock tracking, alerts for low stock, recipe management with product-ingredient relationships. Largest feature module (176KB).

features.name: Menu Design
features.description: Visual menu editor with theming, live preview, product variants, and addons management. Supports category organization and drag-drop ordering.

features.name: Order Management
features.description: Kanban-style order board for tracking order status, order creation terminal (POS), order scanning via QR codes. Supports takeaway and dine-in orders.

features.name: Client Management (CRM)
features.description: Customer relationship management with client profiles, loyalty points tracking, and client-specific order history.

features.name: Finance Module
features.description: Financial reporting with charts, cash shift management, payment processing integrations (MercadoPago). Invoice processing capabilities.

features.name: Staff Management
features.description: Employee/staff management with custom roles and permissions per store. Role-based access control for different sections.

features.name: Store Settings
features.description: Store configuration including business details, staff invitations, payment settings, and multi-location management.

features.name: SaaS Admin Panel
features.description: Multi-tenant administration for managing multiple stores/venues. Owner invitations, tenant overview, global user management.

features.name: Table Management
features.description: Restaurant table layout management for dine-in service tracking.

features.name: QR Code System
features.description: QR code generation for tables, scanning functionality, and order linking via QR codes.

features.name: AI Chat Assistant
features.description: Integrated AI chat powered by Google Gemini for generating product descriptions and providing smart insights.

features.name: Offline Support
features.description: PWA with Service Worker, IndexedDB for local data storage, offline indicator, and sync capabilities.

features.name: Toast Notifications
features.description: Global toast notification system for user feedback and alerts.

features.name: Audit Log
features.description: Activity logging and audit trail for tracking user actions across the system.

features.name: Client Ordering (Public)
features.description: Public-facing pages for clients to view menu, place orders, and track order status.

features.name: Venue Control Panel
features.description: Real-time venue operations including live activity monitoring, kitchen display, and order fulfillment tracking.
